sentence.Network_en: I like cheerful, uplifting middle-of-the-road pop.
sentence.Network_cn: 我喜欢曲调欢快而且令人振奋的大众流行音乐。

sentence.Network_en: I like a film to be uplifting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我喜欢振奋人心的电影。

sentence.Network_en: He talks in uplifting terms about the promise of American life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对提高美国生活水平所做的承诺振奋人心.

entry.tran: 振奋人心的；鼓舞人心的；令人兴奋不已的
entry.def: You describe something as uplifting when it makes you feel very cheerful and happy.
